comments:

were connected to the following errors are thrown:

The chat room throwing exceptions when the IM is disconnected has been fixed so
I'm closing this bug.  We would like to keep the behavior of the IM client(s)
being disconnected when the Buddy List view is closed, at least for the time
being.  Please let us know (ecf-dev@eclipse.org) if you would like a different
behavior as we could easily allow this to be configurable.
